creditline: Gift of Bill and Roberta Stein
description: image is vertical column of 19 red and peach colored cherries with green stems and 2 cherries at L, one purple and one red; on dark blue/black background with black horizontal stripe in lower half; on cream color paper with deckle edges

title: Twenty-Two Cherries (VI. cared for anyone not at all)
